author: Special Correspondent
text:
Legal problems arising from conflict over appointment of a stadium officer by Greater Chennai Corporation have affected the management of playgrounds and sports facilities in the city. Alleging that the civic body had appointed a stadium officer for playgrounds by overlooking the seniority of more than six playground instructors, some of the staff members have been staging a protest.

A number of senior playground instructors alleged that the civic body had appointed a new stadium officer without considering the seniority list. After some of the playground inspectors moved HC, the civic body was directed to appoint the senior most person as stadium officer. The playground instructors said that the civic body had not acted as per the direction of the High Court.
title: Row over appointment setback to playground management
